description: Turn to this salmon pizza for a fresh take on toppings. Rocket, salmon, avocado and lemon combine with cheese on slices that will have your tastebuds delighted.
keywords: Seafood pizza,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Tomato,Spinach,Peanut free,Salmon
name: DIY Salmon Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 115g raw salmon, skin off, cut into cubes
1 cup Mixed Leaf baby spinach & rocket

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place bread on baking tray and spread with ricotta. Sprinkle over half the spinach and rocket, cheese and salmon. Bake for 8 minutes or until cheese has melted and salmon is just cooked through.

Meanwhile, place tomato, avocado and remaining baby spinach and rocket into serving bowls. Sprinkle cooked pizza with thyme and season with pepper. To serve, allow people to dress their own pizza slices with the extra toppings and a squeeze of lemon juice.
